statements: SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE age > 18;
SELECT name, gender FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT passenger_id, name, ticket_purchased_date FROM passengers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY ticket_purchased_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE travel_history @> '{"Destination": "Paris"}';
SELECT passenger_id, name, age, travel_history->>'Country' AS country FROM passengers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT name, age FROM passengers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM passengers;
SELECT name, age FROM passengers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT passenger_id, travel_history->'destination' AS destination FROM passengers WHERE travel_history->>'destination' = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM ticket_purchases WHERE passenger_id = 1234;
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM ticket_purchases;
SELECT * FROM travel_history WHERE origin_location = 'New York' AND destination_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT passenger_id, travel_date FROM travel_history ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, COUNT(*) AS number_of_purchases FROM ticket_purchases GROUP BY passenger_id HAVING number_of_purchases > 2;
SELECT passenger_id, ticket_number, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM ticket_purchases WHERE passenger_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM ticket_purchases WHERE purchase_amount >= 100.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, travel_date, origin_location, destination_location FROM travel_history WHERE passenger_id IN (54321, 67890) ORDER BY travel_date ASC;
SELECT passenger_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM ticket_purchases GROUP BY passenger_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM ticket_purchases JOIN travel_history ON ticket_purchases.passenger_id = travel_history.passenger_id WHERE ticket_purchases.passenger_id = 98765;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE passenger_id = 101;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE ticket_type = 'First Class';
SELECT destination, travel_date FROM travel_history WHERE passenger_id = 201 ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM passengers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM tickets JOIN passengers ON tickets.passenger_id = passengers.passenger_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE passenger_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, passenger_id, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01' AND ticket_type = 'Business' ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM passengers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_history WHERE destination IN ('Paris', 'Tokyo', 'New York') AND travel_date > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY travel_date ASC;

SELECT ticket_id, passenger_id, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND passenger_id IN (SELECT passenger_id FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'Female') ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, ticket_id ASC;
SELECT passenger_name, fare_amount FROM ticket_purchase;
SELECT origin, destination, travel_date FROM travel_history ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM passenger_details WHERE passenger_id = 1;
SELECT pattern_id, travel_date, total_passengers FROM ridership_patterns WHERE average_fare > 50;
SELECT passenger_name, purchase_date, fare_amount FROM ticket_purchase ORDER BY fare_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_purchase ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, purchase_date FROM ticket_purchase WHERE fare_amount > 50;
SELECT passenger_name, travel_date, origin, destination FROM travel_history WHERE origin = 'New York' AND destination = 'California';
SELECT passenger_name, contact_number FROM passenger_details WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT pattern_id, travel_date, average_fare, total_passengers FROM ridership_patterns ORDER BY total_passengers DESC;
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM passengers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_ticket_price FROM tickets;
SELECT DISTINCT destination FROM travel_history WHERE passenger_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM passengers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM passengers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT passenger_id, travel_date, destination FROM travel_history WHERE destination = 'Paris' ORDER BY travel_date ASC
SELECT booking_id, passenger_id, ticket_id FROM bookings WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY booking_date DESC
SELECT origin, destination, distance FROM routes WHERE distance < 500.00 ORDER BY origin
